name: Wired Up (JayMarBu, aemslie00, JLeslie, DM_RENNIE)
description:
Play as a smiley and dopey character connecting and disconnecting wires and machines to get to the end of each level. 

the game will ask you to master logic gates, conquer gravity pads and work your way through 10 tricky levels.
